original_text:
Book of Atem
Tra gli ultimi prodotti del catalogo della Microgaming, Book of Atem è una slot machine che seppur di qualità, come del resto tutti i giochi di questo provider, non presenta novità o funzioni che ci facciano spalancare gli occhi dallo stupore.
Nonostante questo, quando diciamo che ha tutte le caratteristiche per diventare una delle vostre slot preferite, lo pensiamo davvero: è uno di quei giochi semplici, dal potenziale di vincita consistente e con una tematica coinvolgente che alla fine la maggior parte dei giocatori sceglie per trascorrere dei momenti di gioco divertenti e non troppo impegnativi.
 
La grafica è molto curata e quello che ci ha colpito è il fatto che a differenza della maggior parte delle slot machine a tema Egitto, questa non prevede colori caldi sulle tonalità del porpora e rame, ma bensì uno sfondo di colore acquamarina che conferisce un’aria rilassante alla schermata, per un’esperienza di gioco davvero easy!
La struttura di Book ok Atem è assai semplice: cinque rulli, dieci sole linee di pagamento e un range di puntate che va da 0,10 fino a 25 €; il Return to Player si attesta su un ottimo 96,45 %, mentre la vincita massima di questa slot machine è pari a 5000 volte la puntata iniziale, per un valore in denaro di ben 125.000 €! Ne vale la pena, no?
Simboli regolari, Wild e Scatter in Book of Atem
In questa slot i simboli si dividono in tematici e non tematici, e in regolari e speciali.
Tra i simboli regolari non tematici, come spesso accade, troviamo i numeri e le lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco dal 10 all’Asso, riprodotti in maniera coerente con il resto della grafica.
I simboli tematici regolari sono invece rappresentati da una ninfea che galleggia in un lago, un cobra e un immancabile faraone, che tra tutti i simboli è quello che paga di più, offrendo una vincita pari a 500 volte la puntata nel caso di allineamento su tutti i cinque rulli.
In Book of Atem il simbolo chiave è proprio il libro di Atem, che svolge la doppia funzione di Wild e Scatter: come Wild funge da jolly sostituendo gli altri simboli, mentre come Scatter permette di accedere al gioco Bonus Free Spins.
Free Spins e simboli espandibili
Quando il Libro di Atem atterra per 3, 4 o 5 volte sui rulli in un singolo giro, si ottiene un pagamento pari a 2, 20 o 200 volte la puntata iniziale, ma non solo, si accederà anche alla funzione Free Spins, cominciando con 10 giri gratuiti.
Prima dell’inizio dei Free Spins uno tra i simboli standard verrà selezionato casualmente e avrà il ruolo di simbolo espandibile: ogni volta che comparirà sui rulli infatti si espanderà fino a coprirli tutti, aumentando così le possibilità di vincita.
Se durante i giri gratuiti si avrà nuovamente una combinazione di tre simboli che rappresentano il Libro di Atem si otterranno altri 10 Free Spins e questo può accadere virtualmente un numero illimitato di volte!

raw_translation.response:
Book of Atem

One of the latest products in Microgaming's catalog, Book of Atem is a high-quality slot machine that, like all games from this provider, does not offer any groundbreaking features or functions. However, we truly believe that this game has all the elements to become one of your favorite slots. It's a simple yet engaging game with the potential for significant winnings that most players choose for a fun and enjoyable gaming experience.

The graphics are well-crafted, and what stands out is that unlike most Egyptian-themed slot machines, this one does not feature warm colors in shades of purple and copper. Instead, it has a relaxing aquamarine background, creating a truly easy gaming experience!

Book of Atem's structure is simple: five reels, ten pay lines, and a betting range from €0.10 to €25. The Return to Player rate is an excellent 96.45%, and the maximum payout for this slot machine is 5,000 times the initial bet, totaling €125,000! Definitely worth it, don't you think?

In terms of symbols, they are divided into theme-based and non-theme-based and into regular and special symbols. Non-theme-based regular symbols include the numbers and letters referring to playing cards from 10 to Ace, all consistent with the graphics. Theme-based regular symbols are represented by a lotus flower floating in a lake, a cobra, and a pharaoh, which pays the most among all symbols, offering a payout of 500 times the bet in case of alignment on all reels.

The key symbol in Book of Atem is the book of Atem, which acts as both Wild and Scatter. As Wild, it replaces other symbols, while as Scatter, it allows access to the Bonus Free Spins game.

When the Book of Atem lands 3, 4, or 5 times on the reels in a single spin, you receive a payout of 2, 20, or 200 times the initial bet and gain access to the Free Spins feature, starting with 10 free spins. Before the start of Free Spins, one of the standard symbols is randomly selected and takes on the role of the expanding symbol. Every time it appears on the reels, it expands to cover the full reel, increasing your chances of winning. If you receive a combination of three Book of Atem symbols during the Free Spins, you win another 10 Free Spins, and this can happen an unlimited number of times!

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Book of Atem is a five-reel, ten-payline slot game from Microgaming. It has a simple gameplay design that many players prefer for casual and fun gameplay. The game features Wild and Scatter symbols, Bonus Free Spins, and expanding symbols that can significantly increase your chance of winning.

Graphics and Theme

Book of Atem stands out from other Egyptian-themed slot games with its calming aquamarine background that creates a relaxing gaming experience. The game's graphics are polished, and it has an engaging theme that gives a new take on the popular Egyptian genre.

Bet Range and RTP

Book of Atem offers a betting range from €0.10 up to €25, catering to most players' bankrolls. The game's Return to Player rate is excellent, at 96.45%, and the maximum payout is 5,000 times the initial bet, which can reach up to €125,000, making it a very lucrative game to play.

Symbols and Payouts

The symbols in Book of Atem consist of thematic and non-thematic regular and special symbols. The non-thematic regular symbols are from ten to Ace playing card symbols. The thematic symbols include a lotus, a cobra, and a pharaoh, which offers the highest payout at five hundred times the bet for a line-up of five symbols. The key symbol is the book of Atem, which acts as both Wild and Scatter, offering substantial payouts and triggering the Bonus Free Spins feature.

Bonus Free Spins

Book of Atem's Bonus Free Spins is one of the most exciting features of the game. When three or more Book of Atem symbols land on the reels in a single spin, you trigger the Bonus Free Spins feature, starting with ten free spins. Before the Free Spins begin, a standard symbol is randomly selected as the expanding symbol, which can potentially cover the entire reel, significantly increasing your chance of winning. The Bonus Free Spins feature can be re-triggered by landing three or more Book of Atem symbols again, and it can happen an unlimited number of times, giving you ample opportunity to earn big payouts.

Review: Book of Atem

Among the latest offerings in Microgaming's catalog, Book of Atem is a high-quality slot machine that, like all other games from this provider, does not offer any groundbreaking features or functions that will leave you in awe. However, we truly believe that it has all the characteristics to become one of your favorite slots: a simple game with a high potential for winnings and an engaging theme that most players choose for casual and fun gameplay.

The graphics are polished, and what impressed us the most is that unlike most Egyptian-themed slots, it does not rely on warm colors such as purple and copper. Instead, it has a calming aquamarine backdrop that creates a relaxing gaming experience.

The structure of Book of Atem is straightforward: five reels, ten paylines, and a betting range from €0.10 up to €25. The Return to Player rate is excellent, at 96.45%, and the maximum payout for this slot machine is 5,000 times the initial bet, a cash value of €125,000! Definitely worth a shot, don't you think?

Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters in Book of Atem

The symbols in this slot are divided into thematic and non-thematic symbols, regular and special symbols. Among the non-thematic regular symbols are the numbers and letters representing playing cards from ten to Ace, consistent with the overall graphics.

The regular thematic symbols are a lotus floating on a lake, a cobra, and of course, a pharaoh, which is the highest-paying symbol, offering a win of 500 times the bet for a line-up of five symbols.

The key symbol in Book of Atem is, of course, the book of Atem, which acts as both Wild and Scatter. As a Wild, it substitutes for other symbols, while, as a Scatter, it triggers the Bonus Free Spins.

Free Spins and Expanding symbols

When the Book of Atem lands three, four, or five times on the reels in a single spin, you get a payout of 2, 20, or 200 times the initial bet. Furthermore, you trigger the Free Spins feature, starting with ten free spins.

Before the start of Free Spins, one of the standard symbols is randomly selected to act as the expanding symbol. Whenever it appears on the reels, it expands to cover the entire reel, significantly increasing the chance of a win.

If during the Free Spins, three Book of Atem symbols again appear on the reels, you'll get another ten Free Spins, and this can happen an unlimited number of times!
